about_the_game: This is an action-adventure game in which you have to take control of a character named Echo and clear the territory of the dark sabor from the wickedness and monsters that inhabit these parts. At the beginning of the game you can take weapons and explore the map, finding resources and stronger weapons, but be careful - there is evil around the corner and it is merciless to the player.
